name: Dialogue Box - The road less traveled
name_original: Dialogue Box - The road less traveled
description:
You find yourself  in a forest clearing, a mysterious voice is following you and trying to help, but your communication skills are... challenging.

Push yourself forward (and back, and sideways) using 6 buttons you think you're familiar with, and try to chart your path through this magical and maddening journey.

A game by
TomerSSH

Made with Unity
